Text:
Completely useless unless you also have the dance pad, of course. But if you do - chances are pretty high you also already have the original of this really fun game :-D

It's a dancing game, so you need the dance pad - see?!
You can play with a keyboard, of course? ;)
Could somone please seed? It's a fantastic game :)

This isn't the real game, it's just the Song Pack A add-on.

:(

And what the fuck is with all these people not making ANY ITG mac torrents? They all went missing for some reason.
